LanguageData.ZP_PrantGreenOnion.label: Negi[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_PrantGreenOnion.description: This Japanese green onion resembles a leek, but is distinguishable by its longer, more slender appearance. As a crop, it has a long growing period and minor yield; yet, its high cold tolerance means it can continue to grow when most other crops can't.
LanguageData.ZP_PrantCabbage.label: Cabbage[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_PrantCabbage.description: キャベツ。耐寒性で水田でも育てられる。一度育てば手間が少ない作物。
LanguageData.ZP_PrantSpinach.label: Spinach[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_PrantSpinach.description: ホウレンソウ。収穫数は少ないが栄養価が高く寒さに強い作物。水田でも育てられる。
LanguageData.ZP_PrantOnion.label: Onion[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_PrantOnion.description: タマネギ。耐寒性の高い作物。肥沃な土地でしか育たたない。
